metadata.title: European Court of Human Rights

abstract.para: The web site of the ECHR in Strasbourg. The text of the European Convention on Human Rights and the Protocols to the Convention are on the site, together with the rules of the Court, the texts of judgments and their effect and general information about the Court and the Convention.

metadata.subject: Dispute resolution and litigation. Human rights.
metadata.language: English, rench, Albanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Estonian, German, Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Ukrainian
